| Property  | Attribute | Description                                   | Type     | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | --------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |

| `caption` | `caption` |                                               | `string` | `undefined` |
| `src`     | `src`     | The source (data) url of the image to preview | `string` | `undefined` |
